statements.query: MATCH (:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}})-[:OWNER]->(:GCPProject{accountid: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:GKECluster) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Delete GCP GKE Clusters that no longer exist and detach them from all previously connected nodes.

statements.query: MATCH (:GKECluster)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{accountid: {GCP_PROJECT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove GCP GKECluster-to-Project relationships that are out of date.
